title: Great
text: This is great app to have to hand but would like to have more of breakdown of the daily transit in the chart...

title: Five Star
text: Couldn't have asked for a better app, has everything I need and then some. Perfect

title: Great free astrology software
text: This a good app especially as it‚Äôs free! I use it to keep an eye on transits but have paid the nominal amount for progressions too. My only negative point is that it doesn‚Äôt offer Solar charts but for the basics for a novice astrology person like me this a good day to day, easy to use app. It‚Äôs free so why not give it a go?

title: Amazing!
text: This application is absolutely incredible! Very easy to use and understand. I really appreciate such a great job. Thank you!

title: Beautiful app, fantastic features!
text:
I'm really impressed with this application! Perhaps one of the most feature full apps I have come across, and they're all really useful. This is a real achievement indeed. 

The one featured that would make this application even better would be if it was possible to see the planetary degree's on the chart. This would make analysis much faster without having to tap on the chart.

title: Wow! Love it !!!
text: One of the best astrology app ever!!! I love the minimal design. Best UI for a astrology app. Just wow. Thank you!!!! Real Stardust this app!!! So smart !

title: Very well produced
text: Absolutely brilliant app, can make it give you notifications for planetary aspects and widget feature - bloody fantastic, I never rate apps but this blew me away

title: Love
text: Love this app! Although could be made a little more understandable for those who want to start learning or those who are just interested in knowing exactly what they're reading or looking at
